Articles.Content:
I need a VTOL with 8 seats (not including cockpit). It needs enough fuel to get to the north pole from the kerbal base.

I'm making a base at the north pole, I'm making my own research vehicle and refueling.

I have mechjeb .21 installed, The one where all the command modules have built in mechjeb if that matters.

It will be helpful to put screens of the ship and instructions if it is complicated to fly, And of course the .craft file.

Also, How do I edit my signature I cant find it in settings.
